select * from `student`
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND num like concat('%',#{num},'%')
AND degree like concat('%',#{degree},'%')
AND class_name like concat('%',#{className},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into `student` (name, num, class_name, gender, phone, degree) values (#{name}, #{num}, #{className}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{degree})
mapper.update: update `student` set point = point + #{point}, count = count + 1 where id = #{id}
